Check the header text font weight changes from 500 to 700
Verify the checkout summary displays exactly 3 line items
Ensure the 'Total' amount is displayed with font weight 700, color #ff0000, and has value '$150.00'
Confirm item prices are right-aligned
Confirm item names are left-aligned
Check the summary box has 1px solid #e0e0e0 border, 20px padding, background color #f8f8f8, and border radius 6px
Confirm the 'Proceed to Checkout' button is enabled and has background color #28a745
